utils.timefeatures.time_features(dates, freq='h')[source]
utils.timefeatures.time_features_from_frequency_str(freq_str: str) → List[TimeFeature][source]

Returns a list of time features that will be appropriate for the given frequency string. Parameters ———- freq_str

Frequency string of the form [multiple][granularity] such as “12H”, “5min”, “1D” etc.
